name: Singularity Smasher
description:
Controls:

Movement: W,A,S,D 

Shoot: Left Click 

Switch weapon: Q 

Use Boosters: Left Shift

Green Projectile invert objects gravity,

Purple projectile freeze them in time for 5 seconds!

You're a gravity maintenance bot aboard a prison ship for singularities, but the singularities have escaped! Smash them by directing crates using your gravity gun.

Only 0.01% of the population managed to beat level 5. Can you?

Pick up the Big Bracc Slam Jam Jar and grab your gravity gun!

NOTE:
It turns out the Level 4 is only accessed by the level select. Beating level 3 locks the game and you must close out, re-start and select level 4 from the level select.
If you are truly worthy, you must select it by yourself.

It's not a bug, it's a feature.

Credits:

Programming: Clavertus and No_Frogs

Art and Animation: Zemasu

Level Design: Golara

Music and SFX: AdamAudio
